meanings.definition: A muscular, thick-walled part of a bird's stomach that grinds food.
meanings.sent1: The chicken's gizzard helps it grind up its food for digestion.
meanings.sent2: Birds use their gizzards to break down tough seeds and grains.
meanings.sent3: The gizzard of the turkey was working overtime after it ate too many nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a gizzard, strong and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The gizzard's powerful muscles make it a vital part of a bird's digestive system.

meanings.sent1: His gizzard wouldn't let him back down from the challenge.
meanings.sent2: She showed incredible gizzard in facing her fears.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was scared, his gizzard pushed him to take the leap.
meanings.sent4: Her gizzard was like a shield against any doubts or fears.
meanings.sent5: The gizzard of determination within her kept her going even when things got tough.
